name: generate_flow_diagram
description: Generate a flow diagram chart to show the steps and decision points of a process or system, such as, scenarios requiring linear process presentation.

data.description: Data for flow diagram chart, such as, { nodes: [{ name: 'node1' }, { name: 'node2' }], edges: [{ source: 'node1', target: 'node2', name: 'edge1' }] }.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.
